# bashfill

## art for your terminal

Bashfill is a folly to let you draw pretty 40x23 seven color pictures for your terminal.

Draw the picture in the browser, then copy the generated bash script.  Saving a pic just creates a URL that can be shared.

Tested on Ubuntu 12.04 and 13.04, a couple Macs and probably lots of other things.

A live demo is at https://max.io/bash.html

Sample image made by @alystair https://max.io/bash.html?

###### *Made with love by Max Irwin (http://binarymax.com)*
